data: Lorem Ipsum is simply dummy text of the printing and typesetting industry. Lorem Ipsum has been the industry's standard dummy text ever since the 1500s, when an unknown printer took a galley of type and scrambled it to make a type specimen book. It has survived not only five centuries, but also the leap into electronic typesetting, remaining essentially unchanged. It was popularised in the 1960s with the release of Letraset sheets containing Lorem Ipsum passages, and more recently with desktop publishing software like Aldus PageMaker including versions of Lorem Ipsum.

It is a long established fact that a reader will be distracted by the readable content of a page when looking at its layout. The point of using Lorem Ipsum is that it has a more-or-less normal distribution of letters, as opposed to using 'Content here, content here', making it look like readable English. Many desktop publishing packages and web page editors now use Lorem Ipsum as their default model text, and a search for 'lorem ipsum' will uncover many web sites still in their infancy. Various versions have evolved over the years, sometimes by accident, sometimes on purpose (injected humour and the like).

Lorem Ipsum is simply dummy text of the printing and typesetting industry. Lorem Ipsum has been the industry's standard dummy text ever since the 1500s, when an unknown printer took a galley of type and scrambled it to make a type specimen book. It has survived not only five centuries, but also the leap into electronic typesetting, remaining essentially unchanged. It was popularised in the 1960s with the release of Letraset sheets containing Lorem Ipsum passages, and more recently with desktop publishing software like Aldus PageMaker including versions of Lorem Ipsum.

It is a long established fact that a reader will be distracted by the readable content of a page when looking at its layout. The point of using Lorem Ipsum is that it has a more-or-less normal distribution of letters, as opposed to using 'Content here, content here', making it look like readable English. Many desktop publishing packages and web page editors now use Lorem Ipsum as their default model text, and a search for 'lorem ipsum' will uncover many web sites still in their infancy. Various versions have evolved over the years, sometimes by accident, sometimes on purpose (injected humour and the like).

There are many variations of passages of Lorem Ipsum available, but the majority have suffered alteration in some form, by injected humour, or randomised words which don't look even slightly believable. If you are going to use a passage of Lorem Ipsum, you need to be sure there isn't anything embarrassing hidden in the middle of text. All the Lorem Ipsum generators on the Internet tend to repeat predefined chunks as necessary, making this the first true generator on the Internet. It uses a dictionary of over 200 Latin words, combined with a handful of model sentence structures, to generate Lorem Ipsum which looks reasonable. The generated Lorem Ipsum is therefore always free from repetition, injected humour, or non-characteristic words etc.
preschool: Hey, I‚Äôm Bella! I‚Äôm in preschool, and I love watching cartoons. I swear, I could be in-front of the TV all day long! Only if mommy allowed it.ü•∫
My favorite ones are Doraemon and Chhota Bheem. All my friends love these too!

Bheem is so strong, cool and noble! He defeats monsters so easily! Bheem and his group of friends are the savior of Dholakpur. I wish I could be like him. But I‚Äôm a girl, and there are no other girls like Bheem in Dholakpur. Chutki is the only girl in Bheem‚Äôs group of friends, and although I love Chutki, she cannot even save herself. I can never be Bheem, and it makes me sad.

If I cannot be Bheem, maybe I should try to be like Shizuka from Doraemon. She‚Äôs so pretty and poised always! I tried to be Shizuka for a week - sweet voice, docility and all elegance - till I grew tired of it. I don‚Äôt know how she does it!
Who should I be like then?
preteen: Hey, long time no see. I'm a preteen now!
We were invited to my cousin‚Äôs birthday. I was shocked to see my aunt in her room attending an important meeting, while my uncle was cooking and catering to the guests.
I was worried and said "I‚Äôm sorry you lost your job uncle. I‚Äôm sure you‚Äôll find something even better soon!"
I don‚Äôt know why mommy kept apologizing to him. I was just trying to make him feel better.
Mommy says doing household work is not just a woman‚Äôs job. But isn't that what we see in those soap operas we watch together, mommy?
teen: I‚Äôve not been doing very well. I can‚Äôt bring myself to look in the mirror. I am too fat, too pimply, too short.
I see all these pretty girls on social media and everywhere around me, and I feel so‚Ä¶.so inadequate.
I‚Äôve been topping my math classes, but the media says that is not feminine. They say it‚Äôs no use.
I had such big dreams, but the media says women are not meant to lead. They say ambitions don‚Äôt suit girls.
Am I truly just trying to defy my true nature?
I‚Äôm not beautiful according to them, and my smarts are of no use. I don‚Äôt know what to look forward to when I wake up anymore. I don‚Äôt know what to live for.
young-adult: Ugh! College applications are coming up and I just can‚Äôt decide what to choose as my major.
Can I tell you something? You have to promise to keep it a secret though. I‚Äôve been watching these coding videos and learning about AI. I can even code simple websites now! It‚Äôs so fun!
But I‚Äôve watched  the ‚ÄúIT Crowd‚Äù. I know computers are for those geeky guys with perms and glasses, not for girls like me! It‚Äôs always the boys - in the movies as well as in real life.
I would just stick out like a sore thumb. The boys would laugh at me, and the girls would call me a weirdo.
I'm scared I would have no friends.
I just wanna follow my passion. I don‚Äôt know what to do!
adult: I am an adult now. Can you believe it?...just feels like yesterday, doesn‚Äôt it?
I‚Äôm working in an IT company now‚Ä¶finally. It took me too long to get over my insecurities.
After finishing college, I worked as a babysitter for 3 years. I was too scared to enter the corporate world with all those men ruling there.

The stereotypes had been too ingrained in me since I was a kid. My capabilities and my job as a woman were cut out for me. The very media I loved to indulge myself in everyday snuffed the life out of my dreams and ambitions.
It took a lot of courage and countless battles with myself to get where I am today...to let myself dream...once again
But I'm here now, and I intend to rule!
